title: This behaviour is disgusting
body: So it's all there, just click on link, and on the images I've uploaded.

replies.body: To add to this, pls OP don't upload anything here that names and shames players (no matter how disgusting their behaviour is) as it is against the boards rules.

I personally would love to know the names of the people who did this and what they did so i can spam report them every time i see them until the automatic system actually notices.

Pm me the deets op.

Be sure to report **accurately**. 

Reporting players because they were a ♥ ♥ ♥ ♥ in a previous game won't do much if they aren't doing anything wrong in the current game. In fact, it lessens your report weight and you become like the boy who cried wolf (that is to say when you report a serious incident your reports don't really have much meaning).

Review of a players behaviour can be triggered off as little as one report, as long as it is an accurate report.

> [{quoted}](name=Yaiamone,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=2aOHbtQL,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-01-27T06:57:25.891+0000)
>
> To add to this, pls OP don't upload anything here that names and shames players (no matter how disgusting their behaviour is) as it is against the boards rules.

Oh really? Oh, I didn't know that, welp.

Reporting is like pissing into the wind, Review of a players behaviour can also take 50-100 games
Well documented cases of people inting/trolling for two weeks, multiple games per day, and no action.

The reporting system is ineffective, especially to do with any behaviour that's not chat based (cursing, racism, etc)
If the players we're inting/trolling, I would suggest a using a ticket, and keep requesting that they forward
it to a player behaviour specialist, and you get a response from that team.

My experience is that will take you 2 or 3 separate replies no matter how you word the original ticket.

They effectively use the support team to ignore nearly all the requests by sending you an canned response
about reporting in the post game lobby.
